title: Roam-Research-Mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides comprehensive access to Roam Research's API functionality, enabling AI tools to interact with Roam Research graphs through a standardized interface.
creator: 2b3pro

ROAM_API_TOKEN.description: The API token generated from Roam Research's graph settings for authentication.

ROAM_GRAPH_NAME.description: The name of the Roam Research graph to operate on.
